org.parboiled.common
Class BitField

java.lang.Object
  org.parboiled.common.BitField

public class BitField
extends Object

This class represents an arbitrarily sized bitfield that provides for efficient operations on large arrays of booleans.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new BitField initialized with the contents of the given BitField.

contains

public boolean contains(BitField field)
Determines whether this BitField fully covers the given BitField, i.e. whether this BitField doesn't change when the given one is ORed in.

Parameters:
field - The field to check for inclusion for.
Returns:
A boolean indicating whether all bits of the given field are also set in this field.
